cobblemon.species.palafinhero.name: Palafin
cobblemon.species.palafinhero.desc1: As it eats the seeds stored up in its pocket-like pouches, this Pokémon is not just satisfying its constant hunger. It’s also generating electricity.
cobblemon.species.palafinhero.desc2: It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they’re precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.
cobblemon.species.bongbong.name: BongBong
cobblemon.species.bloodmoonursaluna.name: Ursaluna
cobblemon.species.bloodmoonursaluna.desc: It crossed the sea and drifted ashore in a new land. Surviving in this place led it to take on a unique appearance and gain special powers.
This special Ursaluna can see in the dark with its left eye and protects itself with mud that is as hard as iron.
cobblemon.species.poltchageist.name: Poltchageist
cobblemon.species.poltchageist.desc1: Trainers poltchageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its green tea.
cobblemon.species.poltchageist.desc2: These Pokémon multiply by creeping into teapots and pouring themselves into leftover tea.
cobblemon.species.dipplin.name: Dipplin
cobblemon.species.dipplin.desc1: It spends its entire life inside an apple. It hides from its natural enemies, bird Pokémon, by pretending it’s just an apple and nothing more.
cobblemon.species.dipplin.desc2: As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.
cobblemon.species.sinistcha.name: Sinistcha
cobblemon.species.sinistcha.desc1: Trainers poltchageist trusts will be allowed to experience its distinctive flavor and aroma firsthand by sampling just a tiny bit of its green tea.
cobblemon.species.sinistcha.desc2: These Pokémon multiply by creeping into teapots and pouring themselves into leftover tea.
cobblemon.species.tapu_koko.name: Tapu Koko
cobblemon.species.tapu_koko.desc1: This guardian deity of Melemele is brimming with curiosity.
cobblemon.species.tapu_koko.desc2: It summons thunderclouds and stores their lightning inside its body.
cobblemon.species.ultranecrozma.name: Ultra Necrozma
cobblemon.species.kingambit.name: Kingambit
cobblemon.species.kingambit.desc1: Only a Bisharp that stands above all others in its vast army can evolve into Kingambit.
cobblemon.species.kingambit.desc2: Though it commands a massive army in battle, it's not skilled at devising complex strategies. It just uses brute strength to keep pushing.
cobblemon.species.landorustherian.name: Landorus-Therian
cobblemon.species.landorustherian.desc1: When the incarnations of wind and of lightning clash, Landorus arrives to quell the conflict. After the tempests and thunderbolts abate, the land is sure to be blessed with bountiful harvests.
cobblemon.species.landorustherian.desc2: Landorus soars through the sky in this form, bestowing plentiful harvests upon the land and earning the people’s reverence.
cobblemon.species.heatran.name: Heatran
cobblemon.species.heatran.desc1: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
cobblemon.species.heatran.desc2: Stories tell of this Pokémon being birthed from the boiling magma within Mount Coronet. Its molten-steel body holds many mysteries.
cobblemon.species.rotomwash.name: Rotom-Wash
cobblemon.species.rotomwash.desc1: This Rotom has entered a washing machine. It nods with satisfaction after it floods the surrounding area.
cobblemon.species.rotomwash.desc2: The model of washing machine that Rotom can inspirit has been discontinued, so these appliances are now traded at high prices.
cobblemon.species.rotom.name: Rotom
cobblemon.species.rotom.desc1: Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.
cobblemon.species.rotom.desc2: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
cobblemon.species.rotomheat.name: Rotom-Heat
cobblemon.species.rotomheat.desc1: If the convection microwave oven is not working properly, then the Rotom inhabiting it will become lethargic.
cobblemon.species.rotomheat.desc2: This Rotom has possessed a convection microwave oven. It will sear the surrounding area with its burning heat, then smile in delight.
cobblemon.species.rotommow.name: Rotom-Mow
cobblemon.species.rotommow.desc1: The lawn mower is one of the household appliances that led to the development of the Rotom Dex.
cobblemon.species.rotommow.desc2: This Rotom has possessed a lawn mower. It will mow down grass and flowers, then swagger around with pride at its accomplishments.
cobblemon.species.rotomfrost.name: Rotom-Frost
cobblemon.species.rotomfrost.desc1: This Rotom has entered a refrigerator. It leaps around gleefully after it uses cold air to freeze the area around it.
cobblemon.species.rotomfrost.desc2: The special motor within the refrigerator is the key to bringing about Rotom's change in form.
cobblemon.species.rotomfan.name: Rotom-Fan
cobblemon.species.rotomfan.desc1: This Rotom has entered an electric fan. It smirks with satisfaction over a prank well pulled after it blows away everything around it.
cobblemon.species.rotomfan.desc2: This Rotom has possessed a lawn mower. It will mow down grass and flowers, then swagger around with pride at its accomplishments.
cobblemon.species.lopunnymega.name: Lopunny-Mega
cobblemon.species.lopunnymega.desc1: It swings its ears like whips and strikes its enemies with them. It has an intensely combative disposition.
cobblemon.species.lopunnymega.desc2: Mega Evolution awakens its combative instincts. It has shed any fur that got in the way of its attacks.
cobblemon.species.samurotthisui.name: Samurott-Hisui
cobblemon.species.samurotthisui.desc1: Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is a product of the Pokémon's evolution in the region of Hisui. Its turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.
cobblemon.species.samurotthisui.desc2: Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is a product of the Pokémon's evolution in the region of Hisui. Its turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.
cobblemon.species.mawilemega.name: Mawile-Mega
cobblemon.species.mawilemega.desc1: It has an extremely vicious disposition. It grips prey in its two sets of jaws and tears them apart with raw power.
cobblemon.species.mawilemega.desc2: Its two sets of jaws thrash about violently as if they each had a will of their own. One gnash from them can turn a boulder to dust.
cobblemon.species.kyurem.name: Kyurem
cobblemon.species.kyurem.desc1: Dwelling within it is a power even greater than that of Reshiram or Zekrom, but the extreme cold keeps that power bound.
cobblemon.species.kyurem.desc2: It appears that this Pokémon uses its powers over ice to freeze its own body in order to stabilize its cellular structure.
cobblemon.species.meltan.name: Meltan
cobblemon.species.meltan.desc1: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.
cobblemon.species.meltan.desc2: They live as a group, but when the time comes, one strong Meltan will absorb all the others and evolve.
cobblemon.species.melmetal.name: Melmetal
cobblemon.species.melmetal.desc1: At the end of its life-span, Melmetal will rust and fall apart. The small shards left behind will eventually be reborn as Meltan.
cobblemon.species.melmetal.desc2: entrifugal force is behind the punches of Melmetal's heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.bongbong.desc: A special agent from Lobotomy Corporation. It's said that it joined the company in search of the hot Fixer, but hardly anyone knows what that means.
